name: Bringer of Blessing
title: Gaming: Bringer of Blessing
in_play_description:
When the attached character uses a Plunging Attack: Deals an additional +1 DMG.
When the attached character uses an Elemental Skill: Heal the attached character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Gaming to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Gaming, equip this card.
After Gaming equips this card, immediately use Suanni's Gilded Dance once.
When the attached character uses a Plunging Attack: Deals an additional +1 DMG.
When the attached character uses an Elemental Skill: Heal the attached character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Gaming in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
